span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. （过度放纵之后）厌倦享乐的，腻烦的： apathetic to pleasure or excitement as a result of excessive indulgence or enjoyment
【例】 Years of ex-trava-gance has made him totally blasé. 长期的奢华生活已使他彻底麻木
【近】 indifferent, jaded, unconcerned, world-weary
【反】 zealous, fanatic 狂热的 curious 好奇的
